summary:
This replacer changes the textures of the glass armor and weapons into a version in Morrowind colors. It doesn´t really work with some weapons and the helmet even if I change the color to a darker black.

Attention: I´ve only tested the paths on my own PC so it could be that they doesn´t work for you. Please give me feedback.
===================
descriptionHtml:
Name: SuiZidE´s Glass Replacer
Version: 1.0
Date: 02/20/2012
Category: Replacer
Author: SuiZidE

Description
===========
This replacer changes the textures of the glass armor and weapons into a version in Morrowind colors. It doesn´t really work with some weapons and the helmet even if I change the color to a darker black.

Install
=======
Extract the files to Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data and overwrite the existing files.

Uninstall
=========
Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.

Credits
=======

Thanks to Bethesda for creating The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim.
Thanks to Growlf for his \"GIMP- Texturenkochbuch für n00bs\".

Tools Used
==========
DxtBmp
GIMP
Paint
author: SuiZidE
